ygData.subject: RE: Great post on item balancing (Long)
ygData.msgSnippet: Actually, I am as old as my server. I started my bard the day Everquest was released. I guess I m just slow. Aranlas Starchaser Master Bard ... From: Rokenn
ygData.messageBody:
Actually, I am as old as my server. I started my bard the day Everquest was
released.

I guess I'm just slow.

Aranlas Starchaser
Master Bard

-----Original Message-----
From: Rokenn Swiftsong
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Sent: 11/29/99 8:58 PM
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Great post on item balancing (Long)

From: "Rokenn Swiftsong" <rokenn@...>

Well like Harmonic posted already you have the benefit of being on a
mature
servers. At 20th level on a non-mature server I had a combine rapier
and a
combine dagger as my main weapons. Barbed Whips were around, but were
trade
only and very rare. FYI at 39th I just got a Runed Falchion this
weekend :)

Again on armor at 20th I was wearing a mix of Banded, Bronze, and a few
magic pieces (spiked leather colar, etc). And I was well equiped (due to

being a merchant bard). I was able to get full steel by 29th. Again on
a
mature server it is not uncommon to see bronze sold for as little as 1
plat
per AC.


At the risk of sounding like an old coot, you youngins today do not know
how
easy you have it :) In my day..... hah
And the game is always changing, hopefully more mid level items will by
added. I still crinch when I remember that the day AFTER I spent 220
plat
on a Well balanced Rapier, the Ornate Dagger was changed into the
Dragoon
Dirk. Then I found that the WB Rapier would only sell back for 45 plat,

aarrrrgggghhhhh. I did manage to trade it for a runed bone fork though
:)

Rokenn Swiftsong - Karana server

EQ Bard Song Analysis
http://rgonzalez.net/EQSongs/

with the subject submissions.
